alert.note: Alert for Portage; Waushara; Wood (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 2:59AM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Wood, southern Portage and Waushara Counties through 400 AM CDT... At 256 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Plainfield, or 10 miles northwest of Wautoma, moving east at 30 mph. Other strong thunderstorms were located over west-central Wisconsin which will move into central Wisconsin after 400 AM CDT. Additional heavy rainfall may lead to ponding on area roads and an increased risk for localized flooding. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Wautoma around 315 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Napowan Scout Camp and Redgranite. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
